Articles.Content:
Might be better as a mod - but what about implementing a 'simulator' in the VAB/SPH which shows how the centre of mass moves as the vehicle uses fuel in the order it would use fuel in-game? Might be particularly useful for spaceplanes.

Personally, I'd make it an upgrade to the VAB/SPH (see HERE)

Just a thought,

Chris
As an example of part of this, check out the RCS Build Aid mod. It adds a second centre of mass marker to show where the centre moves to when the craft is empty
